item.title: Directive 8020 Release Date Revealed, Pre-Orders Now Live
item.content:encoded:
The first game in the next season of Supermassive Games’ Dark Pictures anthology is now available for pre-order.

As revealed in a new trailer, Directive 8020 will release on May 12, and players can now pre-order it for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series consoles. The game was originally scheduled for early October 2025; however, Supermassive announced layoffs in July 2025, which pushed the release to 2026.

What to Expect From Directive 8020

Directive 8020 is a Sci-Fi survival horror game where the Earth is dying, and a crew travels to a new planet that can hopefully be the next home for Humanity. However, the planet is home to an alien organism that can take the form of any crew member, setting the stage for a tense experience.

Lashana Lynch, known for her work in The Woman King, stars in the title, where choices matter and will affect the outcome of the main campaign.

This is the first non-VR Dark Pictures Anthology game since 2022’s The Devil in Me. The games were originally released annually, but the team ultimately decided they didn’t want to be tied to such a demanding schedule.

“We don’t want to be tied down to a game every six months or one every year or anything like that. This game’s big, and we want it to be treated as such,” Will Doyle, creative director of Directive 8020, told Eurogamer back in 2024 about the upcoming title.

Are you excited for the upcoming horror game? Sound off in our official Discord server.

For more survival horror on Insider Gaming, check out what the director behind Resident Evil Requiem has to say about the new direction of Leon Kennedy’s attitude in the forthcoming title. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today (#976)—Answers for Wednesday, February 11
item.content:encoded:
You’re midway through the week, and I hope I’ve helped you figure out the NYT Connections answers more than once! This Wednesday, you’ve got a doozy of a challenge to solve, but guess what? I’m here, as always, with the NYT Connections hints you need to either get one step closer to or ultimately solve today’s puzzle.

Read on to get the NYT Connections hints and answers you need!

How to Play NYT Connections

In June 2023, NYT Connections emerged as yet another game in the ever-growing New York Times lineup. This title soared immediately, and it’s easy to see why. As a free-to-play, accessible New York Times game, NYT Connections is available to users worldwide and can be played on either desktop devices or via a mobile app.

But how do you play NYT Connections?

The NYT team will provide you with a grid of 16 words once a day. The only task left up to you is to sort those words into four groups of four by finding their commonalities. Every NYT Connections puzzle has just one solution, and some words might have a double meaning, so it can sometimes be tricky to figure out the answers.

It’s also important to stress that the words are color-coded: yellow, blue, green, and purple. That’s in order of difficulty from least to most difficult, too.

What’s critical here is that you get four guesses every day, and if you use those, your NYT Connections answers for today will be out of reach, as it’ll be game over.

Today’s NYT Connections Hints (February 11)

Here are the words from today’s NYT Connections puzzle:

  • NET
  • RINK
  • MOON
  • CAKE
  • RETURN
  • PUCK
  • BLOCK
  • GAIN
  • PINE
  • BRICK
  • COASTER
  • BAG
  • DERBY
  • SWOON
  • YIELD
  • YEARN

And here are the hints I can offer for today’s NYT Connections:

  • Yellow – You might do these if you really love someone
  • Green – What you might refer to ‘incoming money’ as
  • Blue – Things that are dense, chunky, or compacted
  • Purple – Words that could be prefaced with ‘roller’

Here’s the final warning before we get to the NYT Connections answers for today, February 11:

Are you sure you want to scroll further?

Very well!

NYT Connections Answers Explained for Today, February 11 (#976)

If you want to jump straight to the answers for today’s NYT Connections puzzle, I’ve got you covered:

  • Yellow – MOON, PINE, SWOON, YEARN
  • Green – GAIN, NET, RETURN, YIELD
  • Blue – BLOCK, BRICK, CAKE, PUCK
  • Purple – BAG, COASTER, DERBY, RINK

When Does NYT Connections Reset?

That’s today’s puzzle, but if you want the next one, the game resets daily at midnight local time (that’s your local time). You’ll have 24 hours to complete the puzzle when midnight ticks over in your timezone.

How did you do? Did you get a perfect run? Let me know what your streak looks like on the Insider Gaming Discord server

Written by

Senior Editor and Esports Lead

Grant's adoration for gaming started on the Amstrad CPC in 1996. Now, he's a multi-platform expert gamer with a deep love for the industry, a passion for esports, and more…

More from Grant Taylor-Hill
